headline: Ask HN: What's with adult profile pics, usernames in YouTube comment section
description:
There are shit tons of comments with adult content profile pic, usernames all over Youtube comment sections. The pics are of women in objectionable clothing, and the usernames are usually related to adult content words.

All the comments seem to be written by actual humans rather than bots. They are quite detailed and always on topic. Eg, If there is a vlog a Youtuber has posted, the comment is in detail about the contents of the blog, Youtuber personality, references to previous videos etc which a bot in current scenario cannot write.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: YouTube评论区中的成人个人资料照片和用户名是怎么回事？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: YouTube評論區中的成人個人資料照片和用戶名是怎麼回事？
description_zh-Hans: 在Youtube的评论区里，有大量带有成人内容的简介照片和用户名的评论。这些照片都是穿着令人讨厌的衣服的女人，而用户名通常是R [...]  [...]
description_zh-Hant: 在Youtube的評論區裡，有大量帶有成人內容的簡介照片和用戶名的評論。這些照片都是穿著令人討厭的衣服的女人，而用戶名通常是R [...]  [...]
